metadata.title: CVE-2016-3874 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: CORE/HDD/src/wlan_hdd_wext.c in the Qualcomm Wi-Fi driver in Android before2016-09-05 on Nexus 5X devices does not properly validate the argumentsarray, which allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted applicationthat sends a WE_UNIT_TEST_CMD command, aka Android internal bug 29944562and Qualcomm internal bug CR997797.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
